title: I got false banned
body:
I got false banned for malicious 3rd party programs or modifications to your League of Legends client. This is so wrong i have done nothing to my league client ever,,,, ever ..... ever. I know they dont care but I have spent $1.5k on game and this makes me so unhappy. i posted a ticket but i just want to make everyone aware of these flase perma bans

EDIT:
I learnt that this may be due to Razer Cortex, a game booster designed for first person shooter games but can be used in league of legends to boost FPS which is what i use it for.. I scanned all the tools on this programs and there is nothing LOL related that would give an advantage to my game play what so ever. Because of this I see no reason why i was perma banned and i think it is a misunderstanding as this programs can not help me "cheat" in anyway possible in League of Legends..  {{item:3070}} 

EDIT: 29/4
This was the response i got (robot)
Hello MysticLlama,

Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. We work hard to preserve a fair and competitive environment in League of Legends. Regardless of intent, use of unauthorized third-party programs is explicitly against the Terms of Use, which can be found here:

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Keep in mind that account sharing of any kind is also against the Terms of Use. You are responsible for all activity on your account, so be sure to keep your account information to yourself.

We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

ScornedNymph
Player Support Specialist
the Dark Sovereign

I looked at the terms again and specificly this phrase:
Using any unauthorized third party programs, including but not limited to "mods," "hacks," "cheats," "scripts," "bots," "trainers," and automation programs, that interact with the Software in any way, for any purpose, including, without limitation, any unauthorized third party programs that intercept, emulate, or redirect any communication between the Software and Riot Games and any unauthorized third party programs that collect information about the Game by reading areas of memory used by the Software to store information; 

Razer cortex does no use any of this.

replies.body:
Hey,

Just to clear up something here. We do not ban players for Razer Cortex.

**We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.**

The reason for this is because IF we divulged this information the there is the possibility that new hacks/exploits are made to circumvent our detection, which would start this arms race between us and the hack/exploit creators.

They create exploit, we create detection, they learn detection and create new exploit, we create new detection etc etc etc etc.

But not divulging information on how our detection works it makes it a lot harder for that to happen.

This seems like a bit of a slap in the face. No one here is interested in a detailed analysis of your detection methods, we're just curious as to why Riot thought OP's account deserved the ban. If providing the name of the specific piece of software that resulted in the ban was really going to give people enough information to circumvent your detection methods, then logically you wouldn't be mentioning *any* software that could result in a ban by name, but Riot has done so more than once.

So really, what's the *real* reason you wont inform OP of why they've received this punishment?

> then logically you wouldn't be mentioning any software that could result in a ban by name, but Riot has done so more than once.

Can you provide some sources on that? I would love to look into that to see what happened.

By providing a software name the people that cheat know exactly what program has been detected (usually they are running multiple). But knowing exactly what software got detected they could
a) stop using the specific program or programs that do similar things
b) warn others he knows to do the same
c) contact the cheat creator to adjust or create a new exploit , creating that arms race

The real reason we have banned his account is exactly what the support ticket says

> Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt

Specifically mentions "MKLOL", "MKJOGO" and "BoL".

Just leaving a comment to let you know I am finding out why we mentioned those but wont mention this.

But my suspicion is there is something fundamentally different between the programs we have listed there vs "scripting" which is also listed but as you can see very vague. (Im not an expert developer/coder so I wouldn't know exactly what the difference is to be honest). But I do want to help you guys understand why we are taking this route. It's all about protecting our experience in the game, our community, and our games competitive integrity.

So do you know that i was definitely having a 3rd party software on my league of legends? because i am very confused you dont have to publicly share it but can you somehow tell me because I dont know if i have been hacked or something because i only had
___________________
LOLReplay
Razer Cortex

and since you are saying these are fine im confused on what caused this ban
Can i just get into a chat room or something please... no one is answering my support ticket and i have no idea STILL why i am banned please a chat room would be great so i can talk to a rioter

I still think a riot read only board or the chat room would work wonders in this kind of situation.
I hope you get your account unbanned, (I haven't seen any negative things or toxicity form you so your all A OK with me)
I'm just kinda frustrated, how long does it take for support tickets. (to be answered by humans)

For me its most of the time, however the rioter who reads you or better yet just reads the name of the support ticket will just hit the Control C + V key. I'm assuming you named it "I was wrongfully banned" etc. Which to riot is a signal to hit "I'm a robot" button.

Try changing your naming to "What third party programs can be ban-able?" Then the first line should be, that you got banned for using no programs or an X program.

This will more then likely increase your chances of talking to a human instead of a robot.
i wrote "I NEED A HUMAN"

ahahah that's kinda funny.

That might actually be a generic name tho?
If you think about it everyone asks for a human, so someone probably just got annoyed and hit that robot button.

Try not to use all caps, and try to make it funny or interesting.
That way you might actually see some human laughter or interest in the response.

80% of the time if you reply saying "thats is not what i asked" it gets a human to answer

well whenever I used to send tickets and i got a bot which did the wrong thing, i just say thats not what I asked for and then ask if its possible to do what i actually asked for

Does it really take 3 days to find this out?

Or did you just think that people would forget about this if you left it long enough?

Of course I didn't think people are going to just forget about it. I am currently in conversation with NA however its still Sunday back there. So give it a couple more days sorry! Weekends and time zones means it usually takes a little while longer for me to get a comprehensive answer from an expert.

Still waiting...

Does it *really* take more than 2 weeks to get a few questions answered?

Apologies I dropped the ball here. Here's the answer below.

The reason is we don't like to advertise for bad software makers. Even if we say don't use these some people will use them any way.  We talked about MKlol directly because we had a huge adoption rate as many as 20% of players in some regions. We also did not ban forever when you used the application. It was only a temp suspension.

This is pathetic. Not only have you completely ignored MysticLlama's request, you wont even acknowledge it when someone points it out to you.

Nice job representing your company, by the way. You're just showing us all that Riot doesn't give the slightest sh!t what happens to the players. As long as you're making money who cares, am I right?

I don't know what else to say, I've tried to help explain why we don't name specific script programs (i.e. why I can't honor the request to tell him exactly what program got him banned). The player support team have had multiple communication pieces with MysticLlama privately in his support ticket already.

If you had considered the situation logically for more than a few seconds you'd realise that it doesn't matter how Riot handles the situation, if these people wanted to advertise such programs they're *going* to advertise such programs. Doesn't matter if you refuse to tell people what program got them banned, nothing changes. Doesn't matter if you publically listed every single program that could get players banned, nothing changes. It's nothing more than a pathetic excuse so Riot doesn't have to give a reason for these bans.

And up until now, you hadn't even *acknowledged* MysticLlama's request. The *least* you could've done is responded to them, even if it was a cop-out.

I did respond to them, I believe this was a direct comment onto their discussion? - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/ihevkPA8-i-got-false-banned?comment=000a

Like I explained above the advertising bit is only one part of the equation. There are other factors too like I listed above;

> By providing a software name the people that cheat know exactly what program has been detected (usually they are running multiple). But knowing exactly what software got detected they could
> a) stop using the specific program or programs that do similar things
> b) warn others he knows to do the same
> c) contact the cheat creator to adjust or create a new exploit , creating that arms race

From all the conversations you guys had with Mysticllama all I heard was "3rd party program". (Sorry to use strong words) But you have FAILED to address any new INFORMATION about this Ban.  First question: What was the program that banned him/
Second question: When did the program get detected? 
And third Question: Why is his ban 80 YEARS!!!

So you stated many times you can not reveal what program banned him, which is basically like hiding the murder weapon in a crime scene. But what's worse your not even giving hints as of which 3rd party program it is, e.g Script, Hack or Mod, we don't know because you won't TELL us which is making it harder for HIM to find out what he did wrong. 

You also NEVER Stated WHEN it was detected. This is a crucial evidence which I feel can be reveal to the public as there is no way mods can do anything with this information to improve their 3rd party programs to be undetected. Back on topic because this is something that MYSTIC LLAMA asked many times in the PLAYER SUPPORT you RECOMMENDED but no response. After he asked that he was BLOCKED FROM asking any more questions which seems shady to me. 

If you have detected him using this "Program" for a few days then you should have no problem telling us what program was used and determine how dangerous this "Program" is or even WARNING HIM that you guys have detect an illegal software and demand for him to take it down. On the other hand if you detected him and banned him on the same time it was detected then that is a very flawed and lazy system. It DESTROYS the whole point of being PLAYER SUPPORT. If that was the case you should just rename it to BOT SUPPORT because you CLEARLY don't care about your fan base if you just use bots to decide when to KILL someone's account with an 80 year sentence. Something that they invested so much time and money into, keeping them smiling during tough times and giving him such happy memories.

Now another question that is yet to be answered is the 80 YEAR BAN!!! Why is this ban so long??? Even IF he did it, EVEN IF! For a 3rd party program of hacking, mod or scripting. A ban like this is uncalled for. You literally just said Maraudaur it was a "temp suspension." 80 YEARS IS NOT A TEMP SUSPENSION, it is a LIFETIME sentence. So you mean the community that XiaoWeiJiao, an LCS player who got caught ELO BOOSTING was only banned from league of legends for 1 YEAR. But a random league player who is accused for a 3rd party program (which you WON'T even go into detail on) gets an 80 YEAR Sentence. 
 This leads me to believe that is so called program is a Major fret and dangerous to you. Which might explain why you refuse to talk about the program's name/type or when you detected it.  Because this program is appears to be more dangerous than saying this "Malphite you are a fucking worthless brainded scumfuck bastard pile of trash mental dickface that should be gunned down in the street like the degenerate you are".  As this person was only banned for 19 days as oppose to 80 YEARS!

So riot or Maraudaur i don't think you would read all this but if you are only going to read one section of this, can you please read this. Riot/Maraudaur why is it that you refuse to unban this account or decrease the sentence to a more appropriate sentence. I'm sure you are human and as a human you can see that he LOVES his account and especially this GAME. Otherwise why would he spend so much money and hours on this game and send paragraphs after paragraphs of messages to the point where you guys Banned him from POSTING ON CHAT and Player Support. Please Riot/Maraudaur, everyone talks about how much they hate this game but the truth is, we LOVE THIS GAME, you guys have given us MILLIONS of hours of entertainment  and it's so Heart Breaking for us as a community to see you guys refuse to talk your LOYAL AND DEDICATED FAN BASE and treat us like we are disposable.

Maraudaur do you really think Mysticllama would do something like this and if you think he does, do you really think he deserves an 80 Year sentence for using this 3rd party program?

Please don't leave us in the dark, Riots come from miscommunication and it's something that nobody would like as you would agree it is a waste of time and energy. 

From Riot Fan NSB

Thanks for trying... My new account is level 20 already... TrollRockz. Please don't ban this account even though i have not added or removed any software from my computer, so the stuff that got me banned is probs still there, but i don't know what it is.... Lets play sometime HeartVine, and thanks for trying! :(

They were already in touch with the player support team, and Player Support definitely know more than me about this topic. Like I said above, there have been multiple responses from the player support team to him/her. But you're right, I should have responded at the time to let them know that Player Support are the best people to talk to.

I can see what you are trying to say, your main basis is if people knew using x/y/z specific script was against the rules then they would stop. While that may be true for some players, for a lot of players that use scripts they know exactly what they are doing (cheating) and still choose to do it anyway.

Naming the specific script will mean yes ultimately that one specific script will be used less, but it does not help us cure the root issue which is remove cheating in game. What it actually does is reduce X script usage, but then a few things happen.

*note when I say players here I specifically mean players that are using scripts not the general player base.

a) Players stop using the specific program but continue to use other programs that were not listed or aren't currently being detected. (this causes our detection rate to decrease until new models of detection are ready, which results in more cheating)

b) Players contact the script creator to adjust or create a new exploit, creating the arms race we want to avoid. (this would once again require the acceleration of new detection models being created)

Yes you are right that they will look to find ways to go undetected regardless, but we are trying to make this as difficult as possible for them.
 
*note numbers below are made up to illustrate a point
For example, say there were 100 different scripts out there and we know about 90 of them and can with 100% accuracy detect 80 of them. Every time we tell players about the specific script we risk those players stopping to use the 80 we can 100% detect, continue to use the 10 we know about but cant detect yet and the other 10 that we may not know about yet. At the same time new scripts pop up that we also need to build tools and detection models for. 

VS

We don't tell players and they are unsure which scripts are being detected so they stop using them all together including the 10 we are building detection models for + the 10 we may not know about yet. Also new scripts take longer to pop up as the script creators aren't sure which ones need updating. 

I don't think the points I have raised are illogical, but I am always happy to discuss. The two key issues I have raised are listed above, if you have points you would like to raise to suggest they aren't valid I am more than happy to hear them.
Maraudaur, stop being an awful human being and talk to OP.

Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension.

But what is it the only things i had that was LOL related was LOLreplay which i researched and riot said it was ok and razer cortex. i don't have or have never used "scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends."
If i get through this you are 100% getting a mystery gift

Just quit this horrible game that perma bans you off of whims from an automated system, it's a joke, and its pathetic that they claim to be a sport yet treat their community like a bunch of dyslexic 13 yr olds. League is going to die because Riot is out of touch with normal human beings.
Bad Day?

its true tho riot don't give 2 shits about anything but pro playa and what to "balance" around them why do youthink their punishment system is so flawed and why do you think they wont get rid of botters
I downloaded Razer cortex just few days ago and got instantly banned for the same reason. For 7000 years{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

"But i didn't cheat."  - Every cheater ever.
it is kinda hard to believe anyone based on this simple fact, cheat or not, no one ever admits to it.....
Yeah I understand that but someone that knows the cheat will be like meh ill make another account. I wouldn't cheat on an account i have spent all my money on

I just read through this whole discussion and all i see is everyone hating on Marauder for doing his job.

This whole post seems like a place to take the piss out of riot and its members.

I believe that one of Marauders last comments (the huge one explaining the reason behind not telling you what the script was that was detected) was spot on.

I think that almost all of Riot's bans are accurate and a good choice. But remember, they are only human when it comes to this. Maybe a machine malfunction caused some strange bans and it was not picked up and riot cant find anything saying why these few wrong bans were wrong.

You guys are being unfair and rude to Marauder when he has answered this post to the best of his ability.
100% wrong. You obviously read nothing........................

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlama,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ihevkPA8,comment-id=00150001,timestamp=2016-06-07T04:15:07.140+0000)
>
> 100% wrong. You obviously read nothing........................

Wait what?

> [{quoted}](name=Truegolddigger,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ihevkPA8,comment-id=001500010000,timestamp=2016-06-07T09:11:17.685+0000)
>
> Wait what?

BUMP

Have you been to an internet cafe/used a different computer recently that MIGHT have unauthorised 3rd party programs installed? Because I've heard of some people have been permabanned after they went to an internet cafe etc.
I played LOL at a hotel using a portal ... Would that count?
hmm I don't think so... it isn't really a 3rd party program that would impact on your game at all :/
So, you haven't used *anything* that interacts with the client/game files? (Including, but not limited to, skin/vo "mods", scripts/macros of *any* description etc.)
0  i never even knew there was 3rd party programs

You're sure you've got nothing interacting with the game/client? Generally, there's usually something that *might* be overlooked by the "banee" that they wouldn't expect to net them a ban. So if there is anything, anything at all, now is the time to mention it.

Otherwise, you'll just need to go through the processes with support. I'm not sure how you'd prove your innocence but if you haven't been using 3rd party software of any kind then there shouldn't be anything on Riot's system to support the ban.

"We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations"

in other words

"we can ban whoever we want for no reason and you cant do shit because its in our ToS that you accepted, wotcha gonna do sue us? go ahead we have more money for lawyers than all your lunch moniez combined trololo gg ez git gwd scrub"

Bringing this post back up. 
My friend, MysticLlama, told me that he/she "got [a] pm saying that [he/she] had been caught hacking in June 2015" in a region of Australia he/she had never been to.
He/she also stated that "they didn't believe [him]" and that he/she was banned from posting.
Is this how players are treated when their accounts are compromised? This is clearly unjust.
Did you get unbanned ? I got banned for no reason exactly like you and i play in macbook with only teamspeak running

Ok so watch this video and replace "YOUTUBE" with "RIOT"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWb14XQYUOI
Exactly
Another thing just came up???/ would Lolreplay count as ban worthy... i installed it 3 months ago but never made an account on it but never uninstalled it.?????
